original_text: When our enemies heard that we were aware of their plot and that God had frustrated it, we all returned to the wall, each to our own work.
korean_text: 우리의 대적이 우리가 그들의 의도를 눈치챘다 함을 들으니라 하나님이 그들의 꾀를 폐하셨으므로 우리가 다 성에 돌아와서 각각 일하였는데

sentences.original_text: that we were aware of their plot
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그들의 계략을 알고 있다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and that God had frustrated it
we all returned to the wall
